A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My first watch had me rolling my eyes constantly with all the cheesiness through the first 3/4 of the movie. The last 1/4 I really enjoyed first watch. Then I enjoyed my second watch much\, much more. Overall as a story\, it’s pretty good. Despite what I see some saying about it being inconsistent to the characters of previous Star Wars movies\, I disagree. It’s consistent and makes sense for the most part. A few things I can’t get over with how much they don’t make sense to me\, but overall it’s a great movie.
